metadata.title: Tuesday, 17th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to deploy Magistrates to the newly created districts of Luampa and Nkeyema;
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    if there are no such plans, why.
(a)    whether the Government has any plans to upgrade Mporokoso District Hospital to a General Hospital in order to cater for the growing population;
(b)    if there are no such plans, why;
(c)    whether the Government has any plans to establish a nursing school at the Hospital; and
(d)    if there are no such plans, why.
(a)    what measures have been taken to facilitate the export of beef to the following continents:
(b)    whether there are any private companies that have expressed interest in exporting beef;
(c)    if so, what their names are; and
(d)    what measures have been taken to ensure that Zambian beef meets the export quality in view of corridor and other diseases in some parts of the country.
